item.title: Really easy simple problem get it over with please. Answered btw
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to the tutorials section. That code isnt right at all. it should be like if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Sir Green")) { playerRights = 3; . Don’t put that as the last one, because if you do, you need an extra } in there. Just put that somewhere in the middle, and change the Sir Green to Jonathan

playerRight = 3 ;
}
and failed (didn’t compile right)
